name: discord-onboarding-bot
description: Modular Discord onboarding bot with CAPTCHA, profile modal, alliance selection, and admin commands.

scripts.help:
echo "Available scripts:
- npm start: Start the Discord bot
- npm run dashboard: Start the web dashboard
- npm run both: Start both bot and dashboard
- npm run dev: Start bot in development mode
- npm run dev-both: Start both in development mode
- npm run install-deps: Install all dependencies"

author: Benjamin
